meanings.definition: A large commercial aircraft designed for transporting passengers.
meanings.sent1: The airbus flew high in the sky, carrying many people to their destination.
meanings.sent2: The airport received a new airbus to add to its fleet of planes.
meanings.sent3: The airbus decided to take a detour and visit a tropical island instead.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams soared like an airbus, reaching new heights of imagination.
meanings.sent5: The airbus roared to life, ready to embark on its next adventure.

meanings.definition: A company that manufactures large commercial aircraft.
meanings.sent1: The airbus announced a new model of plane with advanced features.
meanings.sent2: Employees at the airbus worked hard to meet production deadlines.
meanings.sent3: The airbus held a competition for the best paper airplane design.
meanings.sent4: Innovation was the fuel that propelled the airbus to success.
meanings.sent5: The airbus stood as a symbol of progress and technology in the aviation industry.
